channel.title: Frugooscape Progress
channel.description:
I don't know if i will get this topic locked for posting here, But since the last time i have been on they changed the forums a bit. *that was a while ago. But Since then i started playing on a server frugooscape that was originally started with moparscape. After being up for 2 years and its success spreading around someone reported us to Jagex and we were threatened to be sued unless we shut down. Now we have almost released our new server and here is one of many new pics of it that are gonna be released daily until the server comes back up.
[IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn236/Kebab76/FrugooScape.png[/img]
Features: *Can communicate with friends in-game either through text or mic. *All items in the game work *Full screen *Will be able to play off the web site *Completely free
*sorry i can't put out any screenies right now of the actual game but as it leaves its beta and is released i will.

I don’t know if i will get this topic locked for posting here, But since the last time i have been on they changed the forums a bit.
*that was a while ago. But Since then i started playing on a server frugooscape that was originally started with moparscape. After being up for 2 years and its success spreading around someone reported us to Jagex and we were threatened to be sued unless we shut down. Now we have almost released our new server and here is one of many new pics of it that are gonna be released daily until the server comes back up.

Features:
*Can communicate with friends in-game either through text or mic.
*All items in the game work
*Full screen
*Will be able to play off the web site
*Completely free
